0.html: Farcastle turns a Warpcast channel into a DAO
0.text: Farcastle turns a Warpcast channel into a DAO
0.title: About

2.html: As the tides of time converge at MCON III in the resilient realm of Detroit, from September 26 to 28, 2024, we unveiled the Post Yer Ale channel, a sanctuary for the holders of the Proof-of-Drink (POD) NFT. This gathering was a crucible, where we harnessed the fervor of the Battle of the Beers, allowing our kin to share tales and forge connections.
2.text: As the tides of time converge at MCON III in the resilient realm of Detroit, from September 26 to 28, 2024, we unveiled the Post Yer Ale channel, a sanctuary for the holders of the Proof-of-Drink (POD) NFT. This gathering was a crucible, where we harnessed the fervor of the Battle of the Beers, allowing our kin to share tales and forge connections.
2.title: Level 1: Forge the First Channel at MCON

3.html:
• Welcoming page at the post.brood.beer subdomain at Brood
  • Festivities during Post Yer Ale Happy Hour at the Tavern
  • POD-gated Post Yer Ale channel within the Warpcast realm

3.title: Items
titles: Level 1: Forge the First Channel at MCON

4.html: We embark on the creation of powerful artifacts and tools to weave the features of DAOhaus into the fabric of Farcaster Frames. Our efforts are focused on unveiling a realm where DAOs flourish, utilizing the channels to transform digital governance.
4.text: We embark on the creation of powerful artifacts and tools to weave the features of DAOhaus into the fabric of Farcaster Frames. Our efforts are focused on unveiling a realm where DAOs flourish, utilizing the channels to transform digital governance.
4.title: Level 2: Craft the Tools of Governance

5.html:
• Establishment of the Farcastle website
  • DAO Overview Frame to enlighten members
  • Proposal Frame to share visions
  • Inception of the Now Playing DAO
  • Guides for crafting a DAO from channels

titles: Level 2: Craft the Tools of Governance

6.html: In our quest to showcase the capabilities of the Farcastle and its tools, we will undertake to share our journey through vivid storytelling and enlightening guides. This level illuminated the path for others seeking to wield the power of DAOs through the newly forged channels.
6.text: In our quest to showcase the capabilities of the Farcastle and its tools, we will undertake to share our journey through vivid storytelling and enlightening guides. This level illuminated the path for others seeking to wield the power of DAOs through the newly forged channels.
6.title: Level 3: Illuminate, Document, and Herald Our Solutions

7.html:
• Visual tales through video walkthroughs
  • A treasure trove of documentation
  • Community gatherings via Tavern voice calls
  • The establishment of Minimum Viable DAOs utilizing Farcaster channels, sharing our insights with the world

8.html: As we progress, we will delve into advanced capabilities such as Yeeter-like onboarding, mini-apps, and proposal creation, ensuring our allies have the tools needed to thrive in the new digital age. Each level brings us closer to realizing our vision of empowered communities harnessing the true essence of collective action.
8.text: As we progress, we will delve into advanced capabilities such as Yeeter-like onboarding, mini-apps, and proposal creation, ensuring our allies have the tools needed to thrive in the new digital age. Each level brings us closer to realizing our vision of empowered communities harnessing the true essence of collective action.
